game.name: Maritime Simulator
game.shortDescription: A realistic vessel traffic simulation where you manage and control maritime traffic in busy waterways. Monitor ships, assign routes, prevent incidents, and keep ports and rivers moving safely as a VTS (Vessel Traffic Service) operator.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A realistic vessel traffic simulation where you manage and control maritime traffic in busy waterways. Monitor ships, assign routes, prevent incidents, and keep ports and rivers moving safely as a VTS (Vessel Traffic Service) operator.
